|rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = |rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = |rad3txchains = 3 |rad3rxchains = 3 |rad3sstreams = 3 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = 600 |rad3n = 450 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = |rad3cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This is a tri-radio device - all radios :(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are BCM43602 (''FullMAC'') :BCM43602 is supported in the mainline '''Linux''' kernel by [[brcmfmac]] "U12H315T20", "801726", and "GP REV 1" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Netgear R8000P|Netgear R8500|Foxconn}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32474-netgear-r8000-nighthawk-x6-first-look#add First look on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.hkepc.com/11543 ''Netgear Nighthawk X6 R8000'' On '''HKEPC HardWare'''] (CN) * [http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/6688/netgear-nighthawk-x6-r8000-ac3200-wireless-router-review/index.html ''Netgear Nighthawk X6 R8000 AC3200'' on '''TweakTown'''] * [http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-r8000.shtml First look on '''iXBT.com'''] * [http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/188-netgear-r8000.html Review on FoxNetwork (RU)] * [http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/146-wireless-router-netgear-nighthawk-x6-r8000-or-even-more-cosmic-space-at-our-homes Review on FoxNetLab (EN)] * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r8000/ Review on OpenITforum (PL)] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=263233 ''Netgear R8000'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=55367 ''Netgear R8000 support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32429-ac3200-routers-by-july ''AC3200 Routers By July?'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :references [http://www.expreview.com/33603.html this '''EXPreview''' (CN) article] * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/32451-mu-mimo-vs-xstream-the-coming-battle-for-wi-fi-airtime?showall=&start=1 ''MU-MIMO vs. XStream: Coming Battle for Wi-Fi Airtime'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s840231 ''Doubles Wi-Fi Speed of Devices with Six Stream 802.11ac'' ('''Broadcom''' PR)] :Announces the '''XStream''' platform (.. which seems to be BCM4709 + 3x BCM43602), :which is touted as 'Penta Core' (each 43602 radio embeds a small processor to allow :for FullMAC operation, 4709 remains the same dual-core Cortex A9 SoC it already was) * [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 ''BCM4709 (1GHz dual-core Cortex A9 SoC)'' Product page] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom Launches Enhanced 5G WiFi Video Streaming'' ('''Broadcom''' PR)] : Announces the BCM43602 3x3 11ac PCIe SoC ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = r8000 build 29968 20160617 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=1072186#1072186 Device Forum Thread] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_r8000 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/r8000 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=55367 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.2 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Recovery==== [https://www.myopenrouter.com/article/how-set-serial-console-netgear-r8000 How to Set Up a Serial Console for NETGEAR R8000] ==Notes== ===GPL Info=== *[https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r8000.h On ''DD-WRT'' GitHub] {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
/*formal version control*/
#define AMBIT_HARDWARE_VERSION     "U12H315T00"
#define AMBIT_SOFTWARE_VERSION     "V1.0.2.99"
#define AMBIT_UI_VERSION           "1.1.99"
#define STRING_TBL_VERSION         "1.0.2.99_2.1.40.1"

#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_NAME          "R8000"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_ALIAS         "Nighthawk X6"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION   
"802.11ac Dual Band Gigabit Wireless Router R8000"
#define UPnP_MODEL_URL              "R8000.aspx"
#define UPnP_MODEL_DESCRIPTION      "802.11ac"

#define AMBIT_NVRAM_VERSION  "1" /* digital only */

/****************************************************************************
 * Board-specific defintions
 *
 ****************************************************************************/

/* Interface definitions */
#define WAN_IF_NAME_NUM             "eth0"
#define LAN_IF_NAME_NUM             "vlan1"
#define WLAN_IF_NAME_NUM            "eth1"
#define WLAN_N_IF_NAME_NUM          "eth2"
#if defined(R8000)
#define WLAN_5G_2_IF_NAME_NUM          "eth3"
#endif
#define WDS_IF_NAME_NUM             "wds0.1"    /* WDS interface */

/* Foxconn add start by aspen Bai, 11/13/2008 */
#ifdef MULTIPLE_SSID
#define WLAN_BSS1_NAME_NUM          "wl0.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_BSS2_NAME_NUM          "wl0.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_BSS3_NAME_NUM          "wl0.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */

/* Foxconn add start, Tony W.Y. Wang, 03/22/2010 @For 5G*/
#define WLAN_5G_BSS1_NAME_NUM       "wl1.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_5G_BSS2_NAME_NUM       "wl1.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_5G_BSS3_NAME_NUM       "wl1.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */

/* Foxconn add end, Tony W.Y. Wang, 03/22/2010 @For 5G*/
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS1_NAME_NUM       "wl2.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS2_NAME_NUM       "wl2.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS3_NAME_NUM       "wl2.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */
#endif /* MULTIPLE_SSID */
/* Foxconn add end by aspen Bai, 11/13/2008 */

/* GPIO definitions */
/* Foxconn modified start, Wins, 04/11/2011 */

#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN        2
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN_STR    "2"
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER        3
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER_STR    "3"

#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1             1
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1_STR         "1"
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2             9
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2_STR         "9"

#define GPIO_WAN_LED                8
#define GPIO_WAN_LED_2              9

#define GPIO_WIFI_2G_LED            13
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_LED            12
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_2_LED          16
#define GPIO_WIFI_SUMMARY_LED       14   // from 15 to 14 by ken
 
#define GPIO_LED_SWITCH             19

#define LANG_TBL_MTD_RD             "/dev/mtdblock"
#define LANG_TBL_MTD_WR             "/dev/mtd"

#define ML_MTD_RD                   "/dev/mtdblock"
#define ML_MTD_WR                   "/dev/mtd"
/* MTD definitions */
#define ML1_MTD_RD                  "/dev/mtdblock9"
#define ML1_MTD_WR                  "/dev/mtd9"
#define ML2_MTD_RD                  "/dev/mtdblock10"
#define ML2_MTD_WR                  "/dev/mtd10"
}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
